title: Grandpa had multiple wives Is my dad's half sister my mahram, Keep kinship with her? assim al hakeem
transcript: Che my grandfather had multiple wives so I have arm from My Father's Side who is Half Blood to me is she my M and mandatory to keep TI of kingship with any child of your grandfather is considered to be a sibling to your father whether they share the same parents or one of the parents whether the mother or the father they are your uncles and aunts and you have to hold the ties of kinship and they are their your Maham if they are women
